content:
Yes, the shopping list and the meal plan recipes are based on the information you provided regarding your dietary requirements, calorie intake, and food preferences. The shopping list includes the necessary ingredients for each meal, and the meal plan recipes are designed to provide approximately 850 calories per meal, within the total daily calorie intake you specified.

However, it is always a good idea to double-check the list and make any necessary adjustments based on your personal preferences or any additional dietary restrictions or requirements you may have.
